snippet: Fans of the HBO series "Game of Thrones" will have an opportunity to raise a flagon of ale in its honor next spring, when a new line of beers inspired by that series is introduced.
abstract: Fans of the HBO series "Game of Thrones" will have an opportunity to raise a flagon of ale in its honor next spring, when a new line of beers inspired by that series is introduced.

headline.main: Coming Soon: The Beer of Kings
headline.print_headline: Coming Soon: The Beer of Kings
